snippet.title: Heroes of the Seasons - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi everyone! Here's a trailer for my latest commercial project, "Heroes of the Seasons"! A Christmas-themed, turn-based, boss-rush RPG. Enjoy challenging battles, and hire mercenaries to create your own party compositions and customize them with different equipment builds that suit your playstyle. You can also visit your house to buy decorations and interact with NPCs and your mercenaries. Uncover the story of why certain villains despise the holidays you're meant to protect.

Special thanks to Berry B for his amazing financial contribution to my games and his support, which made many of my game's assets possible.😍

Heroes of the Seasons on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782260/Heroes_of_the_Seasons/

Heroes of the Seasons on Itch:
https://starmage.itch.io/heroes-of-theseasons

Hope you all enjoy it! ^_^

Music:
ISAoSOUND AIRYLUVS

Other LINKS:

(Collab remaster coming soon)
Stellar Bewitching Remastered on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2561090/Stellar_Bewitching/

(My first commercial game )
Rave Heart on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1375880/Rave_Heart/

More info on Rave Heart:
https://starmage.itch.io/rave-heart​
https://rpgmaker.net/games/10335/​
